name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR+
summary:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR+ (also known as Maximum Tune 6 RR PLUS, Maxi 6 RR+, or Maximum Tune 6 Double R PLUS) is an arcade racing game developed and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment, based on the Wangan Midnight manga. As the thirteenth installment in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune arcade series, this game marks the third upgrade to Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6, following the 6 R and 6 RR updates. It was released in Japan on April 17, 2024, with the release date for the Asian version yet to be confirmed.

The game was announced during a live stream celebrating the 20th anniversary of the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series.
